message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and the unparalleled experience it offers, we believe its true value exceeds $15000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.
